website_summaries.verdict: Teaches via touch and sound in a manner that infants can absorb in a nurturing way.
pros: Safe and stimulating for infants and can adapt as your baby continues to develop
We love the plush fabric as much as the toy's ability to sense when your little one is asleep
Introduces new words and sounds with softness and purpose
cons: Some wish the toy's tone was not so high pitched

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for your little one.
customer_reviews.text: BEST PRESENT EVER! My 1 year old niece absolutely loved this. There are different setting dials to choose from and the hands and feet when pressed have different things. Her favorite was sliding the toggle switch to the right and it played the buzzy bee song. Her favorite color right now is pink so it’s quite perfect and you can turn it off anytime if your child just wants to cuddle with it. Sometimes it’s on a sensor with movement so if you want quiet time or putting your little one down, make sure you put it in the off position or it will spontaneously play. This is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and light toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy has some catchy tunes! (Bee aware) I bought this very early for my daughter to keep attention during tummy time with the lights on the bees tummy. It worked! It has also been small enough and easy enough to tote around. We use it frequently as a distraction while I change her now (rolls over) quality is great. Easy to push hand buttons that my baby can push them. Wings make noises for her too. You will like this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: Cute, entertaining and well made.
customer_reviews.text: My premature triplet grandchildren have physical therapy and this is one toy the therapist uses with them so I knew it must be a good one and I have witnessed them with it and they really love it. They are 5 months now but were born 10 weeks premature. It's really cute! It is motion activated, sound activated or you can press the little button to activate it. It plays a lot of little songs and the light flashes off and on to keep the little ones entertained. I hope I can wait till Christmas to give it to them, haha!
customer_reviews.author: gr82cu2

customer_reviews.title: It's colorful and a sweet bee
customer_reviews.text: My special needs Granddaughter loved the lights and music. She is 15 yrs. old, but functions at a way lower level. If it has lights and music, she is happy, if not, gets tossed aside,. I think toddlers would love it as well as that's about the age it would normally be for. Great gift and sturdy enough for older special needs children.
customer_reviews.author: LiL Bit Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my 7 month old granddaughter. She loved it and played with it for quite some time. Plans tunes and has a number list that counts. She is still a little young for it but she certain likes the music and lights.
customer_reviews.author: Crisscat

customer_reviews.title: Great interaction, greSt sensory components
customer_reviews.text: We call our baby Penelope, Bumblebee. We buy her all things Bumblebee. This is SO SO cute. Live the bed time option music. It’s so cute. Makes her giggle. She just turned two. July 14th 2019
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Hoch

customer_reviews.title: sleep toy
customer_reviews.text: even my 2.6 year old son is obsessed with this.. has nice tunes. i love that it can be switched over to sleep mode and my daughter can fall asleep listening to it .. lullably approved and works as a security blanket
customer_reviews.author: shivanie t.

customer_reviews.title: It was terrific and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I order this item for my grand daughter. It was terrific and beautiful. She was smaller and would just lay in her bed and watch it. Now she is big enough to carry it and cuddle with it at bed time. I would recommend this product. It is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Rise H

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a adorable baby gift!! Works great! And my niece loved it!! She kept giving it kisses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn’t like it at first. She starting to like the flashing and Noises. But she loves chewing on the wing.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy for the price. Comes with batteries which are a big plus my daughter loves this.

customer_reviews.title: One of her favorites
customer_reviews.text: Both mommy and baby love this as it has day and night songs. Is sweet and soothing for nighttime.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for a 1yr. Old she lives and kisses it all the time!!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

customer_reviews.title: I give this a B
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old enjoys this toy. She likes to switch from toy to toy. I like the features and would recommend purchasing this. The one thing I wish it had would be an option to control the volume.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bee. I bought two of them. The kids love the music and the learning as well.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, well made, the materials are nice. Wish there was a volume control that's why the 4 stars not 5. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Our daughters loves it, plays plenty of music. The only problem is it doesn't stop making noise unless it's off.

customer_reviews.title: it's adorable and my granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES her bee. I paid 30 for the pink, a bit more than other colors compared at 25. The pink were selling on EBay for 230 over Christmas. Haha. Anyway, it's adorable and my granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful music.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 7 months old and just loves this. She is so surprise when she yells out and it starts playing. I really the the night time mode. very soft and relaxing. beautiful music .
customer_reviews.author: T. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loved this musical bee when she received it at Christmas. I was thrilled to notice that she preferred this over her other presents at Christmas. The lights and sounds really caught her attention. I also love that it is available in the more girly pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kogl

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my favorite granddaughter. She said that it's very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my favorite granddaughter. She said that it's very cute, and she likes all of the cool features. Her mother reports that she is kept very entertained by it. Overall, an astounding toy, literally astounding.
customer_reviews.author: KMO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby is in love with it. It has a lot of cute songs and it just sounds very pleasant and funny for the babies.

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a 1 and 2 year

product_meta.title: VTech Touch & Learn Musical Bee, Pink
product_meta.description: Your little bug's bound for loads of learning fun with the touch and learn musical Bee. This sweet crib toy puts some punch into playtime teaching basic numbers, shapes and colors. Shake the touch and learn musical Bee to hear upbeat melodies and fun sounds. Or soothe baby to sleep with lullabies and nature sounds. Sound sensor automatically activates the touch and learn musical Bee to put fussy babies back to sleep.
feature_bullets: 4 Press buttons teach colors, numbers and shapes
Sound sensor to help soothe crying baby
Motion sensor in play time mode
Soft, glowing light in sleepy time mode, playful flashing light in play time mode

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars184 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
